project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that asks multiple-choice questions, tracks the user's score, and displays it at the end of the game. Questions and answers will be stored in a variable inside the code.

task.name: Design the question structure to hold questions and multiple-choice answers.
Implement the logic to ask questions and capture user input for answers.
Create scoring logic to track the user's score throughout the game.
Implement functionality to display the final score at the end of the game.
Write tests for each function implemented in the quiz game.
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly.
